text:
1. Prepare to swing
2. Grip the tennis racket
3. Position your body sideways to the net
4. Bend your knees slightly
5. Rotate your upper body and shoulders
6. Swing the racket back
7. Shift your weight onto your back foot
8. Uncoil your body and swing the racket forward
9. Make contact with the tennis ball
10. Follow through with the swing
11. Recover to a ready position
